Class Converter

java.lang.Object
org.nasdanika.common.ReflectiveConverter
org.nasdanika.common.DefaultConverter
org.nasdanika.persistence.Converter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Composeable<Converter>, Converter
public class Converter extends DefaultConverter
Reflective converter providing some common conversions, some of them chained
Author:
Pavel
